sections.Over 50 years ago:
??? years ago
- Birth of Renya Karasuma
98 years ago
- Birth of Amanda Hughes[2]
85 years ago
- Birth of Misae Yamamura[3]
72 years ago
- Births of Jirokichi Suzuki[4]
71 years ago
- Birth of Pisco (Kenzo Masuyama)[5]
67 years ago
- Amanda Hughes meets Rum at Renya Karasuma's birthday party.[2]
61 years ago
- Birth of Konosuke Jii[6]
60 years ago
- The Suzuki family conglomerate is founded.[7]
56 years ago
- Birth of Toshiro Odagiri[8]
54 years ago
- Births of Kiyonaga Matsumoto[9], Atsushi Miyano[10]
53 years ago
- Birth of Mary Sera[11]
52 years ago
- Birth of Hiroshi Agasa[12]
51 years ago
- Birth of Shiro Suzuki[13]
>50 years ago
- The Black Organization's main research project, which involves the eventual development of APTX 4869, is initiated.[14]
sections.41-50 years ago:
50 years ago
- Birth of Hyoue Kuroda[15]
- Kurisuke Agasa, Hiroshi Agasa's rich accountant uncle died at the age of 38.[16]
- Death of Renya Karasuma [17]
49 years ago
- Births of Shintaro Chaki[13], Katsumasa Ogura[18]
48 years ago
- Birth of Elena Miyano[19]
About 47 years ago
- Rum appeared at the International Economic Forum's Annual General Meeting on behalf of Renya Karasuma who was absent due to poor health. [20]
45 years ago
- Birth of Kohji Haneda[2]
43 years ago
- Births of Tomoko Suzuki[21], Naomichi Mugikura[22]
42 years ago
- Birth of Shizuka Hattori[23], Ginzo Nakamori  He was 41 when got introduced in Detective Conan File 156. In Magic Kaito File 37, his age is 42, implying that he had his birthday in the timeline of both series. [24]
41 years ago
- Births of Joji Hatamoto[25], Futoshi Ejiri[26]
sections.31-40 years ago:
40 years ago
- Birth of Midoriko Nakamori[24]
- Hiroshi Agasa met Fusae Campbell. Late in November, Agasa found out Fusae had suddenly moved away, and she left him a letter saying that she will meet him in a secret place 10 years from November 24.[27]
39 years ago
- Birth of Iwao Ida[26]
38 years ago
- Births of Eri Kisaki[28], Kogoro Mouri[29][30], Zengo Goto[31]
37-38 years ago[32]
- Births of Yusaku Kudo and Toichi Kuroba
37 years ago
- Births of Yukiko Kudo[33], Jun Omura[34], Rumi Wakasa[35]
35 years ago
- Births of Kansuke Yamato,[36] Taka'aki Morofushi (Komei)[37]
33 years ago
- Birth of Reiko Kujo[38]
32 years ago
- Births of Genji Kojima, Yoshiaki Hara, Shuichi Akai
sections.21-30 years ago:
30 years ago
- Births of Muga Iori, Yuya Kazami
- Teitan Elementary's current school buildings were constructed.[39]
- Atsushi Miyano moved out of his father's house thirty years ago to join Shirohato Pharmaceuticals for his research.[40] Atsushi's childhood friend Souhei Degima takes up residence in it.[41]
- Ethan Hondou enters the CIA.[42]
- Shizuka Ikenami is a finalist in the kendo championship in eighth grade.[23]
29 years ago
- Births of Yui Uehara[36], Rei Furuya[43], Wataru Date[44], Hiromitsu Morofushi, Jinpei Matsuda, Kenji Hagiwara
28 years ago
- Births of Ninzaburo Shiratori, Miwako Sato[45], Yumi Miyamoto, Jodie Starling[46], Shukichi Haneda, Fumimaro Ayanokoji, Sayo Ohashi, Sugihito Enomoto[47], Yuzo Tomizawa
27 years ago
- Births of Andre Camel, Hidemi Hondou[48], Takayoshi Tsujimura
26 years ago
- Births of Wataru Takagi[49], Sumiko Kobayashi, Osamu Kenzaki, Takuya Mifune
25 years ago
- Birth of Tomoaki Araide
- Shirohato Pharmaceuticals got bankrupt. Atsushi and Elena opened a small clinic.[40]
24 years ago
- Births of Ayako Suzuki, Kazunobu Chiba[50][51][52], Naeko Miike[53][54], Takeshi Hatamoto, Yukiko Katsuragi, Tomomi Sakaguchi
23 years ago
- Births of Azusa Enomoto, Sakurako Yonehara
22 years ago
- Birth of Yoko Okino
sections.11-20 years ago:
≈20 years ago
- While studying for an acting role, Sharon Vineyard learned disguise techniques from Toichi Kuroba alongside the aspiring young Japanese actress Yukiko Kudo.[55][56]
- Atsushi Miyano, Elena Miyano, and a 4-5 year old Akemi visited Atsushi Miyano's father's house, then occupied by his childhood friend and playmate Souhei Degima.[41]
20 years ago
- Birth of Natsuki Koshimizu.
- Vermouth kills Jodie Starling's father.[57]
- While acting as a decoy to catch a serial hit-and-runner, Midori Megure met then junior police officer Juzo Megure. She and Megure were hit by the serial hit-and-run driver and received matching forehead scars.
19 years ago
- Births of Hideo Akagi, Ryusuke Higo
- Atsushi Miyano decides to join a research facility sponsored by the Karasuma Group.
18 years ago
- Births of Shiho Miyano[58], Makoto Kyogoku[59], Kazumi Tsukamoto, Takahiro Sanada
- Masayoshi Sato is killed in a traffic accident as he was about to deliver a bank robber to the police.
- Toichi Kuroba meets his wife-to-be, Chikage, at a Phantom Lady heist at the Eiffel Tower, thus making his first appearance as Kaitou Kid.[60]
17 years ago
- Births of Sonoko Suzuki, Heiji Hattori,[61] Kazuha Toyama,[62] Eisuke Hondou, Saguru Hakuba,[63] Asami Tsuburaya, Aya Nanakawa, Nakamichi, Keiko Momoi, Akako Koizumi, Momiji Ooka
- Kohji Haneda is killed with some formulation of APTX 4869 during a case in the US, his name is later placed on the APTX victims list. Amanda Hughes is killed and the cause remains unknown. Her bodyguard Asaka disappears. Tsutomu Akai was requested by Mr. Haneda, Kohji's father, to investigate the case. He instructed his wife Mary Sera and sons to leave England secretly for Japan, where it could be safer for them, and it was at this time that Tsutomu disappeared, and is apparently killed, in the process—his body is not found.
- Shuichi Akai leaves his family with the goal of getting US citizenship and joining the FBI to investigate what happened to his father.
16-17 years ago[32]
- Births of Shinichi Kudo[64], Kaito Kuroba, Aoko Nakamori, Masumi Sera
16 years ago
- Birth of Ran Mouri[65]
15 years ago
- Kiyonaga Matsumoto got the scar over his left eye when a serial killer he was chasing wounded him with a katana slash.[66]
13 years ago
- The first contact of Shinichi Kudo and Ran Mouri[67]
sections.6-10 years ago:
10 years ago
- Hidemi Hondou left her home to join the CIA.[68]
- Mary and Shukichi reunite with Shuichi after 7 years apart. Shuichi and Masumi meet for the first time. They encounter Shinichi, Ran and Yukiko. Shinichi proclaimed himself as "Holmes' Apprentice".
- Shukichi graduates from high school and changes his family name from Sera to Haneda.
- The first contact of Shukichi Haneda and Yumi Miyamoto.[69]
- Shinichi and Ran enter Elementary school, and Shinichi's childhood adventure occurs.[70] At this time, Yusaku Kudo already knows that Toichi Kuroba is Kaitou Kid.[71]
Simultaneously, Eri Kisaki has her first trial.[72]
- Simultaneously, Eri Kisaki has her first trial.[72]
- Ran encounters Fusae Campbell at the ginkgo trees. Fusae was waiting for Agasa, who had not shown up the previous two times.
- Kogoro Mouri and Eri Kisaki begin living separately from one another after an argument. (Movie 2)[73]
- One of Yusaku Kudo's incomplete novels is stolen (and will be used to construct a murder 10 years later).[74]
- Simultaneously, Eri Kisaki has her first trial.[72]
8 years ago
- Birth of Toji Funemoto
- Toichi Kuroba is killed by Snake, leading to the eight-year disappearance of Kaitou Kid.[13]
7 years ago
- Birth of Takuma Sakamoto
- Jinpei Matsuda, Kenji Hagiwara, Wataru Date, Rei Furuya, and Hiromitsu Morofushi attend the police academy together.
- Shinichi and Ran encounter Kenji Hagiwara in a park while accidentally breaking a water faucet by kicking a ball and making the water leak out. Kenji Hagiwara stops the water from going out by stuffing the baseball in the hole to stop it.[75]
- Kenji Hagiwara is killed in an apartment bombing on November 7th when one of a duo of bombers gets revenge for his partner, whom the police accidentally killed while he was running away. Hagiwara was the friend of Jinpei Matsuda who successfully disarmed the other bomb. The bomber's remaining partner plans for revenge 4 years later.[76]
6-7 years ago[32]
- Births of Ayumi Yoshida,[77] Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya,[78] Genta Kojima[12]
6 years ago
- Deaths of Minerva Glass's father and aunt
sections.<1-5 years ago:
5 years ago
- Shuichi Akai begins infiltrating the Black Organization and begins dating Akemi Miyano.[79]
- Shiho Miyano is known to be working for the Black Organization as a scientist at the age of thirteen. She may have started to work even earlier.[80]
4 years ago
- Shinichi Kudo enters middle school and joins the soccer team. He catches Asami Uchida's eye. She attempts to confess to him, but he rejects her because he already likes Ran Mouri.[81]
- Ethan Hondou sacrifices his life to protect his daughter Hidemi Hondou's cover when she makes a mistake.[82]
- The Night Baron computer virus ruins Kaneshiro Genichirou's girl dating game.
- Masumi Sera was taught by Scotch how to play a few notes on the bass.[83]
3 years ago
- Jinpei Matsuda joins Metropolitan Police Division One under Miwako Sato's tutelage. On November 7th, Jinpei Matsuda is killed by a bomb in the 72nd seat of a Ferris Wheel in Haido Shopping Mall which was set by the same man who killed Matsuda's partner Kenji Hagiwara four years ago. Matsuda sacrificed himself in order to transmit a vital clue to Sato, where a larger bomb had been set.[76]
- Masumi Sera and Mary Sera move from Japan to the Britain, due to they learns that Tsutomu Akai apparently roaming London.[84]
- Shinichi Kudo and Heiji Hattori meet and separately solve a case at a ski resort.[85]
2 years ago
- Shuichi Akai receives the codename Rye, and is called to work under Gin, but is rejected from the Black Organization after Andre Camel ruins the FBI's trap for Gin.[86]
- Tequila shows up at the office of computer graphics designer/games system engineer Itakura Suguru to say he was interested in the particular “system program” Itakura stopped developing one year ago.
1 year ago
- Shinichi Kudo and Ran Mouri enter Teitan High School.
- Shinichi Kudo solves his first solo case on a plane to Los Angeles. When he and Ran arrive, they then catch a second plane to New York.
- In New York City, Vermouth tries to lure out and kill Shuichi Akai while disguised as a serial killer. Her plot fails when Shuichi shoots her in the stomach. Ran encounters Shuichi while he is looking for the serial killer. Vermouth later runs into Shinichi and then Ran on a fire escape stairway. While preparing to shoot them, Vermouth slips off and is saved from falling to her death by the two teens.
- Teiko, the sister of Hiroshi Agasa's uncle, Kurisuke Agasa, passed away at 76.[16]
- Kansuke Yamato chased a parole jumper he believed to be involved with town hero Kuroto Kai's mysterious death into a mountain, where he got caught in the avalanche that took his left eye and leg.[87] He was missing and believed dead for until school friend Taka'aki Morofushi (Komei), also a police inspector, went against orders to track down the criminal and find Yamato.[37]
- Suguru Itakura is given a forced one-year deadline to finish the program Tequila was interested in one year ago.
- Wataru Date is hit by a sleepy driver and dies while working with Wataru Takagi on a case. Date's girlfriend commits suicide soon afterward. A close friend of Date's girlfriend, mistakenly thinking she killed herself because a police officer named Wataru had dumped her, plots revenge against the wrong Wataru: Takagi.
<1 year ago
- Sharon Vineyard "died" and Chris Vineyard came out in public (not counting movies and private interviews given to reporters) for the first time at her funeral.
- Kaito Kuroba takes up the mantle of Kaitou Kid.[13] He and Shinichi have a showdown at a clock tower in Tokyo. [88]
- Shinichi Kudo and Ran Mouri go to the Aquarium and Shinichi solves the  Aquarium Case.
sections.Conan Arc (Manga: 1-175, Anime: 1-128):
- Shinichi goes to Tropical Land with Ran to celebrate her recent karate victory. He encounters two members of a secret organization named Gin and Vodka who give him a mysterious poison that causes Shinichi to shrink until his body appeared to be that of a 6-7 year old.[89]
- Shinichi creates the alias Conan Edogawa and moves into the Mouri Detective Agency hoping to make the failure Kogoro Mouri into a great detective in order to find cases related to the secret organization.[90]
- To avoid suspicion, Conan enrolls in Teitan Elementary.[91]
- Akemi Miyano is murdered by Gin after she succeeded at robbing a bank for 1 billion yen to free herself and her sister from the Black Organization.[92] Her death precipitates her sister's boycott of the APTX 4869 development program and eventual betrayal. Akemi's death also triggers FBI agent and former boyfriend Shuichi Akai to seek revenge against the Organization for killing her.[79]
- The Detective Boys are formed.[93]
- Ran suspects Conan may be Shinichi, forcing him to adjust his behavior to be more childlike and ultimately needing Hiroshi Agasa to impersonate Shinichi over the phone to give Conan an alibi.[94]
- Conan runs into Gin and Vodka on a bullet train and foils their plan to eliminate a useless transaction partner by blowing up the train.[95]
- Conan turns down his father's offer to run and hide until his contacts can find the Organization and some APTX4869.[96]
- Shinichi is challenged to a deduction battle by a high school detective from Osaka, Heiji Hattori. Conan drinks some of the paikaru Heiji brought and turns back to normal. He solves the case, beating Hattori, while also managing to keep his secret identity hidden.[97]
- Conan runs into Tequila at a game convention. Tequila dies in an explosion intended for someone else, and the meeting point his contact revealed, the bar "Le Cocktail" in the "Daikoku Building", is destroyed by a bomb before Conan could arrive. Conan learns that the Organization is interested in the world's top programmers.[98]
- At a convention for Holmes Lovers, Conan is forced to solve a murder using Heiji as a 'sleeping detective'. Heiji wakes up partway through and figures out that Conan is Shinichi. Conan tells him the whole story to keep him from telling Ran the truth about Conan's identity.[99]
- Ran once again decides that Conan must be Shinichi, but allows Shinichi's mother to convince her otherwise. [100]
- Conan faces off against Kaitou Kid for the first time since he was shrunk.[101]
sections.Sherry Arc (Manga: 176-242, Anime: 129-1:
- Ki'ichiro Numabuchi flees the Black Organization.[102]
- Former Black Organization member codename "Sherry", real name Shiho Miyano, decides to take APTX 4869 to commit suicide because of her sister's death. Instead, she shrinks into a seven or eight-year-old girl. She escapes from the Black Organization and runs to Shinichi's house where she is found and adopted by Professor Agasa. She takes the alias Ai Haibara and enrolls in Teitan Elementary in Conan's class. The Black Organization begins looking for her.[103]
- Introductions of Yumi Miyamoto and Miwako Sato.
- It is discovered that Wataru Takagi is interested in Miwako Sato. However, he thinks she fancies Inspector Megure and doesn't have enough courage to ask her out.
- Sonoko Suzuki meets Makoto Kyogoku for the first time.
- Tomoaki Araide's father dies from electrocution after his second wife kills him. Hikaru Yasumoto was in fact who made him die due to the killer's plan, but she doesn't find it out as Conan decided to make her think she was innocent as she would be really sad to know she had killed her employer.
- Conan and Ai face off against Gin, Vodka, and additional members, including a politician Kenzo Masuyama and an American actress Chris Vineyard, attempting to stop an assassination at Haido City Hotel. Ai obtains some data on APTX4869. After nearly killing temporarily regrown Sherry, Gin believes she'll no longer hide in Beika. Vermouth decides to stay in Japan.[104]
sections.Vermouth Arc (Manga: 243-437, Anime: 179:
- Conan is shot on a camping trip with the Detective Boys, and Ran reveals renewed certainty in Conan's identity. Given a temporary antidote to make an alibi with Ran, instead of solving a murder, Shinichi shows his face to the whole school, including Vermouth. [105]
- Shinichi asks Ran out to dinner, intending to at least confess his feelings for her, but is interrupted by another murder case and then re-shrinking into Conan.[106]
- Conan meets Jodie Saintemillion.[46]
- Conan and the Detective boys get caught in a bus hijacking with Jodie, Shuichi Akai, and Tomoaki Araide. Ai resigns herself to dying rather than being a liability, but Conan protects her and orders her not to run away. [107] The same day, all of the files on Kogoro's Tokyo-based cases are stolen from the Metropolitan Police Department.[108]
- The Sunset Mansion detective's gathering turns to murder, with Kaitou Kid and Saguru Hakuba making guest appearances.[109]
- The Detective Boys prevent the kidnapping of James Black, newly arrived in Japan to assist Shuichi. [110]
- Ran catches a glimpse of Shuichi, but can't remember where she saw him. [111]
- The stolen files on Kogoro's cases are mailed back to the MPD; Shuichi keeps surveillance on the agency.[108]
- Heiji and Conan investigate Jodie, but find nothing definitive about her identity.[112]
- Ran has a fever and remembers the events in New York, including Shuichi's identity. [113]
- The Detective Boys encounter ex-Organization member Kiichiro Numabuchi.[114]
- Conan gets a lead on the Org via murdered game designer Itakura Suguru and nearly tricks Vodka into providing more tangible information, only to be prevented and nearly caught by Gin. [115]
- Shuichi recognizes Shiho in Ai's face, and begins having her watched or watching her himself. [116]
- Vermouth listens to Conan and Agasa via a bug in Agasa's house.[117]
- Conan and Ai recover cassette tapes recorded by Ai's mother, Elena Miyano, before her death, and hidden by Akemi the week before she died.[118]
- Vermouth invites Shinichi to the Halloween cruise, implying that she knows Shinichi is Conan. Heiji takes Shinichi's place at the event to confuse the rest of the Organization about Shinichi's status, which allows Conan to impersonate Ai and bait Vermouth using Jodie's help. Ai interferes with the standoff to sacrifice her life to protect everyone she's connected to, but Shuichi and Ran save her and Jodie, though Vermouth escapes with Conan. Conan hears the keypad tones of the Boss's phone number and Vermouth promises him she'll give up on killing Shiho, but she escapes him as well rather than kill him.[119]
- The FBI offers Shiho a place in the Witness Protection Program, but she declines. [120]
sections.Boss's Phone Number Arc (Manga: 438-498,:
- Conan and Heiji catch a bomber at the baseball Koshien between Kohnan High School and Ohgane High School.[121]
- Jirokichi Suzuki first challenges Kaitou Kid.[4]
- The real Araide Tomoaki returns as the Teitan High School doctor. [122]
- Conan finds out the Black Organization boss' e-mail address, which comes from the song Nanatsu no Ko. Haibara tells him not to investigate further, as the boss' address is "Pandora's box".
- A text to Shinichi picked up by Conan's phone makes Ran highly suspicious of Conan's identity. Conan sets up a trick to give Shinichi a live alibi, and decides to give Ran the number of the cell phone he uses as Shinichi. [123]
sections.Kir Arc (Manga: 499-621, Anime: 425-508):
- After solving a minor case for Yoko Okino's co-worker Rena Mizunashi, Conan accidentally discovers that Rena is actually Black Organization agent Kir. With the help of the FBI, Conan foils an assassination attempt, and they accidentally capture Kir, unconscious, rather than Vermouth, whom they were trying to capture. [124]
- Eisuke Hondou transfers to Teitan High School. He declares a keen interest in Kogoro, but watches Conan suspiciously during several cases.  [125]
- Eisuke Hondou strongly reminds Conan of Rena Mizunashi, and Eisuke attempts to charm and manipulate information about her from Kogoro. [126]
- The Black Organization and later Eisuke learn about Kir's fate from Toji Funemoto. [127]
- Conan meets Saguru Hakuba for the second time over a detective competition.[128]
- Conan learns that Eisuke's father, Hondou, worked for "The Company". [129] "The Company" is CIA. Kir is a NOC (Undercover agent).
- Gin demands that Kir kill Shuichi to regain the Organization's trust. Kir shoots Shuichi, pushes the body into his truck, and then makes it explode. Fingerprint on Conan's mobile matches the body that was recovered at the scene.
- Eisuke tells Conan that he will go to America to join the CIA, and Conan confesses to him he's Shinichi, which Eisuke claims to have guessed for a long time.[130]
sections.Bourbon Arc (Manga: 622-898, Anime: 509-:
- First mention of Bourbon. Introduction of Subaru Okiya, from whom Haibara senses the Black Organization aura. Okiya moves into Kudo's house.[131]
- Ran meets Okiya for the first time.[132]
- Introduction of Scar Akai, who approaches Jodie Starling to confirm about Shuichi Akai's death. Scar Akai saves Conan's life.[133]
- Introduction of Taka'aki Morofushi (Komei).[134]
- Jodie tries to find Scar Akai, who approaches Camel later. Okiya notices Scar Akai. The Black Organization prepares to assassinate Scar Akai, whom they think is the real Shuichi, but retreat after Vermouth informs Gin about a plan that they had gotten the Boss's approval to execute.[135]
- Kogoro, Ran, Agasa, and Conan are on a trip to London. To get past airport security, Haibara gives Conan two antidotes to APTX 4869 for the trip and the return home. During the trip, they are trying to stop the terrorist, Hades Sabara, who is planning to kill Minerva Glass's mother in revenge for his mother's death. In order to help Minerva, Conan proclaimed himself as "Holmes' Apprentice".[136]
- Conan meets Masumi Sera, who is transferring to Teitan High School.[137]
- Masumi shows interest in Subaru. She also informs the Detective Boys about Ai Haibara's appearance in a video of Agasa that she found on the Internet.[138]
- Masumi meets Heiji and Camel for the first time.[139]
- Introduction of Tooru Amuro;[140] Amuro takes a part-time job at Cafe Poirot and becomes Kogoro's apprentice.[141]
- Conan is kidnapped by a case suspect, Amuro helps the Mouris rescue him, while Masumi follows them from behind. Haibara and Agasa try to locate Conan inside Okiya's car. During the chase, Okiya and Amuro notice each other. Amuro recognizes Masumi. Vermouth arrives at the scene and gives Bourbon a call.[142]
- Scar Akai approaches Masumi.[143]
- Masumi meets Okiya. Okiya finds out that Conan is Shinichi Kudo.[144]
- Haibara takes the antidote of APTX 4869 to rescue the Detective Boys from a fire. Mitsuhiko films a video of Shiho Miyano and sends it to Kogoro's office. Amuro logs into Kogoro's computer and sees the video of Shiho wearing the ring used to board the "Mystery Train". The computer is then hacked by Okiya.[145]
- Vermouth informs Gin that Sherry is going to be aboard the Bell Tree Express Mystery train. Gin plans to blow the entire train up at the station with large amounts of C4. Meanwhile, Vermouth disguises as Scar Akai and Amuro, who is Bourbon, will also be aboard the train and will attempt to capture Shiho alive. Lastly, Kaitou Kid disguises as a passenger aboard the train to investigate it for an upcoming heist. Okiya, Yukiko, and Conan worry that Shiho may be targeted by the Black Organization because of the video, and they come up with a counterplan to trick Vermouth and Bourbon into targeting Kaitou Kid by mistake.[146]
- While on the train, it is revealed that Elena Miyano was trying to work on a drug which she called "Silver Bullet". Masumi meets Scar Akai and questions him, but is knocked out. Subaru tricks Haibara into hiding in an empty room, and Conan forces Kaitou Kid to disguise himself as Shiho. Amuro confronts the disguised Kid and reveals himself to be Bourbon. Amuro had been disguising himself as Scar Akai to test the reaction of people who are close to Akai in order to confirm his death. Yukiko tries to stop Vermouth and forces out of her that she has some reason for not wanting the shrinking of Conan and Haibara to be known. Vermouth then executes her real plan, which is to kill Shiho rather than capture her alive like Bourbon wanted, and she blows up the train caboose with Kid in it. Kid successfully escapes, and the train stops before it reaches the final station where Gin was waiting. Vermouth reports Shiho to be dead, but finds out she was tricked when she sees Agasa carrying Haibara. Amuro wonders if the mysterious figure he saw was Shuichi and decides to reinvestigate Shuichi's death. [146]
- Amuro takes a break from Poirot pretending to be sick, but then returns to work later. Vermouth asks Amuro why he isn't leaving the Detective Agency, and he replies that the Sleeping Kogoro has caught his interest—Amuro seems to have realized that Conan is the one behind "Sleeping Kogoro".[147]
- Kaitou Kid returns to steal the Blush Mermaid, a gem attached to the shell of a sea turtle. Masumi tags along with Conan, Ran, and Sonoko. Kaitou Kid disguises as Masumi, but doesn't take the gem because it is a fake. [148]
- Introduction of Shukichi Haneda, who solves a case alongside Conan.[149]
- Conan meets Jodie to inform her that Scar Akai was actually Amuro/Bourbon, in disguise. He requests that the FBI investigate why Amuro still hasn't left Poirot, since the Black Organization has been convinced that Sherry was killed. A disguised Amuro bugs Jodie and overhears Jodie's descriptions about Shuichi Akai's actions one night at Haido Central Hospital, and Conan's anxiety over Jodie even referring back to those moments. A disguised Vermouth retrieves the bug from Jodie.[150] Conan panics upon discovering that Bourbon and Vermouth were present.[151]
- Sonoko introduces Makoto to Masumi at a bowling alley. Masumi reveals to Conan she has a second brother, who looks quite similar to her father. She then finds out that he knows Conan.[152]
- Tomoko Suzuki makes a deal with Makoto—if he can protect The Green Emperor from Kaitou Kid, she will allow him to be with her daughter. He succeeds.
- Takagi accidentally reveals at a crime scene in front of the Detective Boys that he has been in Sato's bed, implying their relationship has progressed significantly.
- Conan learns Masumi is sheltering a mysterious child, whom she refers to as a "little sister from outside the domain."[153][154]
- Using Natsuko Shibuya, a teacher friend of Jodie's, Amuro gains intel on Rikumichi Kasuda's cause of death from an unsuspecting Camel.[155]
- Amuro believes Shuichi faked his death by using the body of Rikumichi Kasuda, and confronts Okiya, whom he believes is none other than Shuichi.[156]
- Shuichi is revealed to be alive, and reveals Amuro's real name - Rei Furuya - causing Amuro to stop pursuing the FBI agents. Amuro is actually an officer of the Security Bureau of the National Police Agency who has infiltrated the Black Organization.[157]
- The following morning, Shuichi explains Conan's plan to fake his death and live in disguise to Jodie and Camel. While telling Vermouth that he will drop his investigation into Shuichi's "death," Rei reveals he knows a secret that's significant enough for other members of the Black Organization to react. First mention of Scotch, a deceased spy who infiltrated the Organization. First mention of Rum, a high-ranking Black Organization member, according to Shuichi.[158]
sections.Rum Arc (Manga: 899-????, Anime: 784-???:
- Shukichi achieves his goal of getting all seven Shogi Titles. His victory for the final title seems to interest Subaru, and the unknown child, who is living with Masumi.[159]
- Introduction of Hyoue Kuroda, a Nagano police chief who knows Conan is the brains behind 'Sleeping Kogoro'.[160]
- Kuroda is re-positioned into the Tokyo Police and takes the place of Kiyonaga Matsumoto, who has been promoted[161]
- Yumi reveals that even if she asks Shukichi out, he refuses because he is busy. Conan seems to think that it is because he is swamped with interviews from having just earned the last of the seven Shogi titles. Yumi describes Shukichi to the group and the descriptions are the same as Masumi's of her Middle Brother. Conan later gets hold of a handkerchief with the name "Mary" embroidered on it, leading to his speculation that "Mary" could be the name of the unknown child.[162]
- Masumi mentions that she was taught guitar by a friend of her brother at the train station, who turns out to be Scotch. A flashback reveals that Amuro met Masumi at that time. Masumi heard Amuro say the name "Scotch".[163]
- Due to a bit of unwashed makeup on Haibara's face, Conan begins to think that she might be related to the unknown child. [164] Because of this conclusion, he wonders about the relationship between Akemi and Shuichi. [165]
- Yumi learns that Shukichi is a shogi champion and the special envelope contents are revealed to be a marriage certificate. She speaks to him by phone and learns that he lost his match, which occurred on the same day, as well as his title. She also learns he has a deceased non-blood brother named Kohji Haneda, who Haibara reveals is on APTX list.[166]
- Conan searches for Kohji online and learns of his mysterious death along with that of Amanda Hughes at a chess tournament in America, 17 years ago. Kohji left a dying message code that resulted in "ASACA RUM", which implicates Asaka, who was Amanda's bodyguard, as well as Rum. Shuichi reveals to Conan that the Kohji case was the reason he joined the FBI.[167]
- Conan believes that Asaka is Rum. Due to a case, it is revealed that Masumi and the unknown child know of Kohji's case. When Conan drops the voice-changing bow-tie, the unknown child does the Sleeping Kogoro deduction in his place, and when the criminal runs, she is able to stop him. Masumi accidentally yells "Mama" after the criminal is rendered unconscious. Conan considers the possibility that the unknown child could be Asaka, due to her strength and the possibility of being shrunk.[168]
- Conan, Shuichi, Amuro, and Vermouth (disguised as Azusa) go to a concert hall where a song called "ASACA" is to be performed. The song title turns out to be a coincidence. Flashbacks about Scotch's death occur, revealing that his death was an accident. Ran recognizes Vermouth's voice when she calls her "Angel" for the second time.[169]
- Introduction of Momiji Ooka, who seems to be in love with Heiji and keeps track of his cases on her phone.[170]
- Introduction of Rumi Wakasa, who is the new, clumsy deputy home room teacher in Conan's class. She secretly leads him to the solution of the case. When out of sight, she displays the ability to take down three robbers using a broomstick.[171]
- Due to a case, Conan realizes that Masumi's comments about various things since she first appeared indicate that she may have actually been in Britain rather than America. He also finally remembered when he had met her before.[172] At the conclusion of his flashback, Conan begins to piece together his information on the Akai family. He realizes that Masumi knows he is Shinichi Kudo, that Shukichi is the middle brother, and that the child living with Masumi is most likely their mother, whose name is indeed Mary, and who was somehow shrunk, like him and Haibara. [173]
- Introduction of Muga Iori, Momiji's butler. He adopts the fake name Shinichi Wada when he visits Café Poirot, to observe Heiji—who is visiting Conan and Ran with Kazuha—on Momiji's behalf. Momiji is revealed to have a formidable intellect when she provides the hint that leads to Conan, Heiji, and Amuro solving an attempted murder case at Poirot. [174]
- Introduction of Kanenori Wakita, a sushi chef who currently works as a table waiter, due to an eye injury, at Beika Irohazushi next door to the Mouri Detective Agency. He asks to become Kogoro's apprentice in exchange for cheaper sushi and Kogoro agrees. [175]
- Due to an accident at the school, Rumi takes the Detective Boys to her apartment building, where a case occurs. Conan finds a receipt which shows that Rumi was prepared for their arrival. During the solution of the case, Rumi trips and incapacitates the murderer. While Haibara comments about her luck, Conan seems to have realized that luck has nothing to do with what has happened with Rumi. The incident is written about in the news, and Kuroda, alongside Wakita, are shown to be interested. [176]
- When Ran's mother is kidnapped, Conan's actions lead Ran to suspect him again.[177]
- Kuroda seems to be investigating the Case from 17 years ago and makes a connection between it and Rumi. He follows her and the Detective Boys while they are camping. A case breaks out, during which Rumi seems to react to the phrase "prosthetic eye", Conan and Haibara realize that Rumi can't see out of her right eye, and Conan notices a strange object in Rumi's back pocket. [178]
- A case occurs during a Kendo tournament where the only witness is a blind man. Heiji is practicing to face his rival Soshi Okita in the finals, but Okita seems concerned about another opponent. Momiji and Iori are in the stands waiting to see Heiji's match.[179]
- Teitan High School organizes a field trip to Kyoto, and Ran, Sonoko, and Masumi get excited about it.[180] Meanwhile, Conan learns of the trip and decides to take the APTX 4869 antidote to return into Shinichi in order to participate on it.[181]
- Thanks to Haibara, Conan manages to participate in the field trip to Kyoto as Shinichi, along with Ran and his classmates. A double murder case occurs there, and thanks to Haibara and Heiji, Conan manages to transform into Shinichi three times and solves the case alongside Heiji and Masumi. Ran kissed Shinichi on the cheek as an answer for his previous confession, and just as the two were about to go for a full kiss, Shinichi turned into Conan again. Masumi informs Mary of the existence of the antidote, and Mary orders her daughter to get her hands on it as soon as possible. Meanwhile, the public begins to discuss the case solved by 3 high school detectives, one of them mentioning seeing Shinichi at the crime scene, and the news spreads quickly on the internet. The 3 Rum suspects; Kuroda, Wakita and Rumi take interest in Shinichi's involvement in the case.[182]
- The paparazzi bombards Shinichi's house while Conan hides at Agasa's place. Yukiko and Yusaku have returned to Japan and convinced the blog owner to retract her claim, in exchange for their autographs. She claims that it was just a rumor, and the paparazzi leaves. Bourbon receives a message from Rum demanding information on Shinichi, saying, "Time is Money!" Yusaku also deduces that the original "ASACA RUM" interpretation of the dying message from the Kohji Haneda case could also be interpreted as "CARASUMA," making Renya Karasuma the possible boss of the organization, the most powerful man in all of Japan, even though Karasuma should be long dead. They decide to stay in Japan.[183]
- Amuro infiltrates the Kudo house to find information about Shinichi and is confronted by Shuichi. The two point guns at each other and have a short, tension-filled conversation. However, they are suddenly interrupted by the appearance of Yusaku and Yukiko, who invite Amuro to sit down and have some tea.[184]
- Kuroda asks Amuro to give major information to Conan about the three suspects involved in the murder of the policewomen. Shukichi sends an email to his brother Shuichi, asking him to protect Yumi.[185]
- Komei realized that his brother, Hiromitsu Morofushi, had been working for the Public Security Bureau and had died while undercover, as evidenced by the bullet hole in his phone.[186]
- Masumi confronts Conan by calling him Shinichi. She also learns that Haibara, who has a mature personality similar to Conan's. Flashbacks reveal that Mary attempted to contact her father in London, and came back later in the body of a middle-school child form.[187]
- Komei saw Amuro from the video footage and realized he is Hiromitsu's friend, who has a nickname "Zero", whom they met before. He suspects that Hiromitsu's phone could be sent by Amuro. However, he pretended he didn't know Amuro and greeted Kogoro only. He passes through Amuro and says, "Every moment is precious. Not a moment should be wasted." With a inner monologues that "Time is money, as the saying goes." after having a private conversation with Kuroda.[188]
- Flashback revealing Rumi was having a conversation with Kohji before his death. While having flashback, she touches her right eye.[189]
- Sera tries to get the APTX 4869 antidote directly from Haibara, but Shuichi, disguised as Subaru, protects her. Flashback revealing that Mary, Shuichi, and Shukichi moved to Japan 17 years ago after Tsutomu Akai disappeared. Conan suspects that Mary is an MI6 agent. Sera starts suspecting that Subaru could be Shuichi.[190]
- Conan suspects that Kohji Haneda is the son of a wealthy family.[191] After his death, Haneda's family adopted Shukichi in order to continue Kohji 's dream.[192]
- Shukichi cannot contact Mary while Mary doesn't know Shuichi is still alive.[193]
- Masumi informs Mary that she sees Conan carrying an APTX antidote in his medicine box. Mary orders her to steal it if possible. Masumi managed to steal the medicine box, but realised that the antidote wasn't in there, as Conan had tricked her by putting it elsewhere. Flashbacks reveal that several months ago, Mary met her husband, Tsutomu Akai, at Vauxhall Bridge. However, Tsutomu was revealed to be Vermouth in disguise, who intended to poison her with APTX 4869, which is created by her sister, Elena Miyano. Mary jumped into the river and shrank. She then returned to her daughter, Masumi, explaining the whole situation to her. Later, they saw Conan proclaiming himself as "Holmes' Apprentice" during Minerva's match on TV, and remembered the same proclamation of Shinichi 10 years ago. They realised that Conan is Shinichi, who shrank the same way as Mary. However, he had a way of returning as Shinichi to board a plane to London. Since then, they decided to return to Japan to get closer to Conan, to get their hands on the antidote.[194]
- Amuro picked up the shogi piece that Rumi dropped by accident, which is a bishop, and recalled that the murdered Kohji always kept it as a good luck charm, which was missing at the crime scene of the murder. Rumi knocks out Amuro to retrieve the shogi piece.[195] After that, Amuro is seen concerned about Rumi with a picture on his phone.[196]
- Vermouth infiltrates the Kudo house to investigate Yusaku as a threat to the organization at the order of Rum. However, Yusaku saw through the Black Organization's attempt to take them out, and planned with the FBI to fool the Black Organization.[197]
- The Black Organization is hunting down Camel with the help of Rum. With the efforts of Shuichi and Conan, he managed to fake his death in front of the Black Organization. He also heard from Vodka that Rum changed his appearance and made up a silly name for himself. Flashbacks reveal that Rum was the old man in the warehouse, where Shuichi's identity as an FBI agent was revealed 2 years ago. He is currently in disguise as Kanenori Wakita.[198]
- In Teitan Elementary School, Haibara's Black Organization sense is triggered. The only people shown to be around are the Detective Boys, school alumni, and classmates of Miyano Akemi. Kobayashi and Rumi arrive shortly afterwards. Rumi's thoughts reveal she knows who the Miyanos are, and she seems surprised at the thought that Ai is Shiho, who took over the drug research after her parents.[199]
- Akemi's time capsule hidden in the school includes a letter to Shiho and a photograph of the two of them as kids. Haibara's Black Organization sense is triggered again, with the same people and more alumni around. Rumi is seen looking outside the window at a leaving Wakita, who arrived moments ago to deliver sushi.[200]
- Introduction of Chihaya Hagiwara, a captain from Kanagawa Prefecture Police Traffic Department. She knows Conan as the one who disarmed the bomb in the Parade Bomber case. That case's suspect's bomb killed her younger brother Kenji Hagiwara 7 years ago. She and Conan ride her motorcycle to find Professor Agasa's kidnappers and use the motorcycle to stop their car.[201]
- Kaitou Kid returns to attempt to steal a tiara called "Queen's Bang". With the help of Yuya Kazami, Amuro is able to place a handcuff on Kid during his escape. This is the first meeting between Amuro and Kid since the Mystery Train case. Amuro seems to think Kid is familiar and may have met him before.[202]
- Amuro helps Conan, Takagi, and Sato solve a case that was previously being handled by Wataru Date. It's revealed that Amuro and Sato have met before.[203]
- During a case co-handled by Gunma Prefectural Police and Nagano Prefectural Police, Inspector Yamamura is reminded of his childhood friend Hiromitsu after looking at Komei's face and learns that they are brothers. Yamamura and Conan learn that Hiromitsu was likely assigned to the Public Security Bureau.[204]
- Jugo Yokomizu and Chihaya Hagiwara separately go to Tokyo to attend a masquerade party. Chihaya reveals Jinpei Matsuda was in love with her. Takagi's reckless actions during the case remind her of him, which causes her to attempt to get close to Takagi. Sato gets in between the two of them.[205]
- Kuroda is revealed to be acquainted with the Ooka Family. Iori has a habit of looking around after exiting a car, and Kuroda comments on it, revealing that they know each other beforehand. Kuroda calls him Sakakibara, which Iori used before as an alias while being undercover somewhere. They also discuss the fact that Iori has met Amuro, and he comments that Amuro is restrained by his past bonds. While eavesdropping, Conan suspects that both of them might be from the Public Security Bureau. A vintage black car passes by, inside of which is a driver wearing a black jacket and black sunglasses, and an elderly man wearing a breathing apparatus, also wearing black. The old man expresses disdain towards the police.[206]
- Kobayashi, Naeko, Shukichi, and Yumi, all separately, go to the same restaurant as pairs when a murder happens. After meeting with everyone, each one of them questions their significant other and everyone else about their meeting. It turns out that each of the three guys asked one of the girls for help choosing a present and went to the restaurant with them as a thank you.[207]
- Masumi Sera attempts to lure Conan into a trap to gain his antidotes for APTX 4869 by having him go to her hotel to get information on an ongoing serial bombing case. It turns out the next target is in their own hotel, and Masumi and Conan use Eri Kisaki's position of the hotel's lawyer to garner more intel on the case. Conan almost finds out about Mary Sera hiding with her daughter and the mysterious man with a breather orders his henchman the sunglasses man to trigger the fire system to let Mary escape[208].
- On a vacation to the beach, the Detective Boys are accompanied by teacher Wakasa and Subaru Okiya, who, during their time alone, stare at each other suspiciously, as if knowing each other's real identities. A murder suddenly happens, and after solving it, it seems that it is connected to a racket gang. Wakasa fights the gang, but has the Detective Boys locked inside to prevent them from seeing, but Conan gets suspicious afterwards of the bruises on her hands[209].
- After gaining another victory against Kid in his newest heist, Conan appears in the newspapers with Jirokichi Suzuki. A  tengu-like Mysterious old man with bird is shown being angry at the headlines, and crushes his phone with his cane[210].
- During a chess tournament, after solving a murder case, Kuroda asks Conan to help him with a case from 17 years ago. Flashbacks reveal that Wakasa was Amanda's bodyguard, Rachel Asaka. Rum wanted Amanda to join the organization. He planned to lure Asaka out by threatening to kill Amanda using a drug, but Amanda decided to commit suicide by swallowing the drug. Asaka managed to arrive at Kohji Haneda's room, only for Rum to nearly discover her hiding spot before Haneda interrupted him, which ended with Haneda being killed with the drug. Kuroda, who initially got a secret order to meet Amanda, managed to get into her room and found her dead body along with her dying message. He later also found Haneda's dead body and Asaka's whereabouts, and helped her escape from the hotel. Unfortunately, his car got involved in a traffic accident, and while Asaka managed to escape, Kuroda got badly injured and was in a coma for 10 years. To present, Rum manages to find Wakasa. He then ordered Chianti and Korn to snipe her, but Wakasa outmaneuvered them and sniped them back[211].
